title: In what aspects do I compare home theater systems? - Quora

response.answer_text: While no one can Deny the cinematic effects of a 5.1/7.1 system, the 2.1 or simple connecting a decent stereo to your tv will be a huge upgrade to audio quality. if you're looking at buying a multichannel HT system, make sure you have a dac for it OR the HT should have an hdmi input and direct hdmi vid out (some older models might have optical in)
